name: Pinball Soccer Challenge
description:
Pinball Soccer Challenge is a fast paced pinball game with soccer rules and realistic pinball physics that allow for real-world pinball techniques like post passes, ball cradling, nudging, and more.

Challenge friends and play against players from all around the world!

Improve your skills and take your game to the next level!
Are you ready to become a pro? Compete in tournaments and earn cash prizes!
